Method Detail

assertLicense

void assertLicense(java.lang.String operationId,
                   org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                   throws LicenseNotGrantedException,
                          TeamRepositoryException
Asserts that the current contributor has a license that allows the given operation.

Parameters:
operationId - the operation to check
monitor - the progress monitor
Throws:
LicenseNotGrantedException - if the license forbids the operation
TeamRepositoryException - if there was any other error

checkLicenses

java.lang.String[] checkLicenses(java.util.List operationIds,
                                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
Checks that the current user has a license to perform the listed operation ids. The result of this call is an array with the same number of elements as the given operationIds list. Each entry in the array is null if the corresponding operation id is allowed, and a String containing the reason for failure if the operation is not allowed.

Parameters:
operationIds - the operations to check
monitor - the progress monitor
Returns:
an array of results that corresponds to the list of requested operation ids
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if there was an error

assertLicenseForContributor

void assertLicenseForContributor(java.lang.String operationId,
                                 IContributorHandle contributor,
                                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                 throws LicenseNotGrantedException,
                                        TeamRepositoryException
Asserts that the given Contributor has a license to perform the operation requested. This methods should rarely be used, and using ILicenseClient.assertLicense(String, IProgressMonitor) is preferred whenever possible.

Parameters:
operationId - the operation to check. Must not be null.
contributor - the contributor to use for the check. Must not be null.
monitor - the progress monitor
Throws:
LicenseNotGrantedException - if no license is available for the operation
TeamRepositoryException

flushCache

void flushCache()
Flushes the cache so that future license checks are forced to communicate with the server to recache the latest results.

getDefaultLicenseId

java.lang.String getDefaultLicenseId(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
Deprecated. 

Get the license id to be assigned to the user during LDAP import.

Returns:
the license to be assigned to contributors imported from LDAP.
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong
Since:
1.0

getDefaultLicenseIds

java.lang.String[] getDefaultLicenseIds(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
Get the license ids to be assigned to the user during LDAP import.

Returns:
the licenses to be assigned to contributors imported from LDAP.
Throws:
TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong
Since:
4.0
